features.name: Welcome Page
features.description: Landing page with welcome screen and navigation to education levels

features.name: Education Level Selection
features.description: Page to select education year (1st Year, 2nd Year, 3rd Year, etc.) without number icons

features.name: Formations/Filieres Listing
features.description: Display list of educational programs (filieres) for a selected year with pagination (5 per page)

features.name: Modules Listing
features.description: Display list of modules for a selected filiere/formation

features.name: Course Materials
features.description: Display downloadable course materials (PDFs, documents) with direct download functionality

features.name: API Client
features.description: Axios-based HTTP client with interceptors for API communication

features.name: Education Service
features.description: Service layer for education-related API endpoints using nested RESTful structure

features.name: Error Message
features.description: Reusable error display component with retry functionality

features.name: Error Boundary
features.description: React error boundary for catching and displaying JavaScript errors

features.name: Routing
features.description: Application routing configuration with React Router
